adrFormatAddress: 1248 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text: Needed my down jacket cleaned. Called several places and J's had the best quote. MOST places were charging close to the cost of a new jacket.  Received the price quoted. Pleased with service.

text.text: Needed my down jacket cleaned. Called several places and J's had the best quote. MOST places were charging close to the cost of a new jacket.  Received the price quoted. Pleased with service.

originalText.text: I will never use them again. 4 months late supposedly billing me for a service from last September; no call, nothing. They almost never delivered when they said they would. I ended up using a different laundry service and things couldn’t be better. I would never recommend this company to anyone. Trying to work out an issue with them is a waste of time.

text.text: I will never use them again. 4 months late supposedly billing me for a service from last September; no call, nothing. They almost never delivered when they said they would. I ended up using a different laundry service and things couldn’t be better. I would never recommend this company to anyone. Trying to work out an issue with them is a waste of time.

originalText.text:
I've been using these cleaners reluctantly for a few years. They are lazy in their attitude towards their customers and they never concede when they are clearly in the wrong.:. They just can't be bothered to do things with pride at all.  for example when I ask them to press pillowcases and only hang matching sets together, they promises but they don't.  Not sure why I get red checked pillowcases and pink flowered cases in a variety of sizes all thrown on to one hanger. Mostly they are incredibly disingenuous with returning things on time. Especially if you use same day service, which lately incurs an extra charge.  I've been stranded without an article of clothing on so many occasions that I've lost count. No matter when you say you need something (even if you give them three or four days) invariably one piece is missing..."it had a spot so we had to send it back" which is J's version of saying The dog ate my homework." If you need to give any instructions 1. write them down and pin it to your clothing and 2. go when "the boss" is there because you should know you cannot ask the assistant questions, make special requests or anything because his English is too limited to communicate with customers. So either leave extensive notes with your clothes or call back to make sure.
I cannot tell you how many nights orders were promised to be delivered and they never showed up.

originalText.text: I design and make custom clothing for a living. I brought J's Cleaners a bias satin slip for a bridal gown, that had been stained. They not only got it perfectly cleaned and pressed, but a day earlier than expected, and notified me via text message!!!

text.text: I design and make custom clothing for a living. I brought J's Cleaners a bias satin slip for a bridal gown, that had been stained. They not only got it perfectly cleaned and pressed, but a day earlier than expected, and notified me via text message!!!

originalText.text: Very expensive. 3 days for a simple load of clothes. They gave me a receipt to pick up clothes on Saturday when they are actually closed. Bad service.

text.text: Very expensive. 3 days for a simple load of clothes. They gave me a receipt to pick up clothes on Saturday when they are actually closed. Bad service.
